Experiment Method.Assay Method: Transfection of LRRK2 cDNA followed by Western blotting and apoptosis assays

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T mutant LRRK2 showed impaired protectivity against hydrogen peroxide-induced apoptosis compared to wild-type LRRK2. Prevention of intracellular degradation of I2020T mutant LRRK2 restored its protective effect against apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with multiple cell lines and clones.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated multiple times.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Lower percentage of apoptotic cells in WT LRRK2-transfected cells compared to untransfected cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Higher percentage of apoptotic cells in I2020T LRRK2-transfected cells compared to WT LRRK2-transfected cells.
